"A BOX WITHOUT LOCKS Key fragments now have a chance of dropping after winning ARAM or Twisted Treeline games
DROPRATE MURPHYS As on Summoner’s Rift, key fragments drop rarely and the more key fragments you earn, the fewer will drop"

anyone know the easiest and fastest way to earn key %%%ments? i have boxes but never any keys

Does any body else have {{summoner:14}} 250-3000ping{{summoner:14}}  right now, since the 6.7 update???? I'm like having 3s delay in commands and need to keep chanting to myself 1 2 3, 1 2 3, 1 2 3, like I'm dancing and I barely win now. The home page takes like 7 minutes to barely load 1 or 2 segments  and shop still keeps closing on me when I open it.
Yaaaay thanks, mini-patch occurred and now it's back to normal. ^_^ After I got help from {{summoner:11}} Riot support & followed instructions. :D

These patch notes make me cringe. Riot seems to throw logic out the window.
So many champions are strong right now because armour items are so strong. So, riot in all its wisdom nerfs the champions that counter heavy armour gameplay. Please in the future do more than simply look at winrates and start nerfing; think about WHY their winrates are so high. 

I would suggest you start with making botrk magic damage again.

Oh hell no

I ain't building any more against a Yi than I already have to

RIP teacup {{champion:51}}

I understand the Global Splash thing is temporary until all of those skins get real updates but geez, what made you choose the Chinese version over ours? Some of them (most of them) are terrible replacements for what we already had. What was wrong with keeping the old ones until they got proper, new splash's? I'm down with all the other changes though

You know what makes me cry? When there's 29 open brackets and 28 close brackets. Rito please. {{item:3070}}

forever waiting on normal draft picks.

Riot, what are you doing?

Dropkick murphys funny band. 
And I want bubblegum lissandra plz. I think would be cool because can still reason with her abilities slow and stick ppl etc. but also is really different from ice ice baby
Half of the splash art updates look terrible...but some dont look too bad, pls change them back
Please keep the current vandal vlad splash art PLEASE {{item:3070}}

When are we going to see some old champions re-updated? looking at you Rito, 

classics like Yorick - (whose ultimate is basically now sions passives but worse)

Kennen - whose fallen so short of being able to put out damage vs this new tank meta,

Reksai - though not a old classic, he REALLY struggles to jungle early, and is a pretty bad lane champion,

Orianna - whose ult shows A ring double the size of what the ult actually is, with Extremely high mana upkeep she struggles to mid lane, especially against new meta

but yet here we are nerfing Poppy whose already been nerfed to the ground :( {{item:3073}}
I see your name is Lollipoppy
{{champion:51}}

Hi, just in regards to nothing involving the new patch, I've noticed something with {{champion:157}} third q animation, sometimes it doubles up the ability range area circle not a big deal just thought I'd let y'all know cheers.

**For the next patch may i suggest to revoke a bug on {{champion:1}} 's stun ?!
For example when {{champion:1}} "Q"'s with her stone on and as {{champion:105}}  i dodge with my "E" her her stun returns since she did not hit the target, which makes her so op in early lane, as unless she misses her ult, she pretty much has a constant stun **
Fizz and Annie are both cancer and should both be condemned to the deepest pits of hell

1. Its not even a bug
2. Youre posting in the wrong section
3. Youre silver 5
4. This isnt even op, if she keeps her stun, it means she isnt using any spells to cs
5. You are basically removing one of fizzes few counters, if this happens (which it wont) he will get nerfed somewhere else, hopefully in his damage.
and finally
6. just outplay

1. i dont think my rank has anything to do with it. plus dont feel to high and mighty because you may in gold im guessing ? only people to talk trash are usually there. I've put to rest and shame kids from much higher elo then you, dont feel to confident it'll smack you in the face.

2. as fizz i was making an example, annies stun apart from items ilke qss for adc's or banshes just cannot be dodged, unlike most other champs who have to skillshot or time there stun, annie can just miss her Q and stun you with something else.
Even zhonya just resets the stun, the whole purpose of this sort of items is to stop some cc in order to get away...

3. i do agree that if she keeps her stun she isn't using any other spells to clear wave, however she basically has a double stun considering champions dodge her targetted Q. therefore making the enemy laner farm even less than she is in order to not get caught.
Maybe the should consider making her Q a skill shot.
